text: This is inhumane and will have devastating effects on the children that are left behind. Make no mistake: I'll keep fighting my heart out for our immigrant communities—and in a Warren administration, immigrant families will be able to live without fear.

Did you know that in NYC, all children can have free breakfast & lunch at summer meal schools, parks,+libraries?

I visited our program in Castle Hill. Kids, families, and camps stop in for community & conversation every day.

Break bread with us sometime! https://www.schools.nyc.gov/school-life/food/summer-meals http://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1159572957641027590/pu/img/2AJOhv5dGiXLbgmv.jpg https://video.twimg.com/ext_tw_video/1159572957641027590/pu/vid/320x568/92uqhQSRiInlolFV.mp4?tag=10
